## Quaternion.scaleToRef() method

Scale the current quaternion values by a factor and stores the result to a given quaternion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleToRef(scale: number, result: Quaternion): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Quaternion</code> | defines the Quaternion object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

the unmodified current quaternion
